meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a student.
meanings.sent1: Her studentship at the university was a time of learning and growth.
meanings.sent2: His studentship allowed him to access the library resources for research.
meanings.sent3: During her studentship, she discovered a love for literature.
meanings.sent4: The studentship was a journey through knowledge and discovery.
meanings.sent5: The studentship experience shaped her future career path.

meanings.definition: The position or status of a student.
meanings.sent1: The studentship of the class president came with responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: His studentship in the school choir brought him joy.
meanings.sent3: She proudly displayed her studentship badge on her backpack.
meanings.sent4: In the studentship of a leader, one must set a good example.
meanings.sent5: The studentship role required dedication and commitment.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which one is a student.
meanings.sent1: His studentship at the college lasted four years.
meanings.sent2: During her studentship, she made lifelong friends.
meanings.sent3: The studentship flew by quickly with all the fun activities.
meanings.sent4: In the studentship of high school, memories were made.
meanings.sent5: The studentship phase was filled with exams and projects.
